qas.question: What did the media industry make possible in the middle of the century?
What did the brutal dictatorships caused by the media lead to?
What did increased communications lead contribute to?
What time period did technological advances lead to?

context: Still, advancing technology and medicine has had a great impact even in the Global South. Large-scale industry and more centralized media made <a0_0>brutal dictatorships<a0_0/> possible on an unprecedented scale in the middle of the century, leading to <a1_0>wars<a1_0/> that were also unprecedented. However, the increased communications contributed to <a2_0>democratization<a2_0/>. Technological developments included the development of airplanes and space exploration, nuclear technology, advancement in genetics, and the dawning of <a3_0>the Information Age<a3_0/>.
